hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/ksh echo "--- Deployment ID: ${BUILD_TAG} - ${BUILD_ID}
" >> /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log VERSION="4.5.0_${BUILD_NUMBER}" cd /opt/checkouts/dai_scm echo "@genUser.devint.sql;" | sqlplus -s 'cm_system/oracle123@(DESCRIPTION=(ADDRESS_LIST=(ADDRESS=(PROTOCOL=TCP)(HOST=10.13.18.61)(PORT=1522)))(CONNECT_DATA=(SERVICE_NAME=scrum004)))' STATUS=${?} if [[ ${STATUS} != "0" ]]; then exit ${STATUS} fi cd /opt/build/scripts ./deployRebuildDb.sh -a dai_scm -t dai_scm -i dai_scm -r ${VERSION} -e devint -j "jdbc:oracle:thin:@10.13.18.61:1522:scrum004" -p DI_SCM -u DI_SCM -v #if grep -q "Liquibase Update Failed" /opt/cie/jenkins/jobs/${JOB_NAME}/builds/${BUILD_NUMBER}/log ; then # echo "DB Update Failed." # exit 1 #fi
